name: Cynthia LASTELLA and Vincent Lastella, h/w, Appellees, v. Peter A. SINAIKO, M.D., Appellant

judges: Before ZAPPALA, C.J., and CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, SAYLOR and EAKIN, JJ.
Justice NEWMAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Cynthia LASTELLA and Vincent Lastella, h/w, Appellees, v. Peter A. SINAIKO, M.D., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Justice NEWMAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Joan Orsini, John Jacob Hare, Philadelphia, for Peter A. Sinaiko, M.D.
Lise Luborsky, Philadelphia, for PA Property & Casualty Ins. Guaranty Assoc.
Carol Nelson Shepherd, Robert P. Zoller, pro hac vice, for Cynthia & Vincent Lastella.

808 A.2d 925

Argued May 14, 2002.
